name: Marvel Comics Secret Identities Three Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Mr. Fantastic

	He's sort of like Stretch Armstrong with brains.

The Absorbing Man.

	With his power, he'd rival Dr. Doom if he had any brains!

Spider-Woman.

	Didn't she have a cartoon in the early 80's with the Thing and his Thing Ring? Other Spider-Women are Julia Carpenter, Martha Franklin, and Charlotte Winter.

Spider-Man.

	I held out long enough. It always amazes me in these quizzes that only 97.4 percent (or something like that) get the cupcake questions. Why do they play that particular quiz if they don't even know the obvious ones?

Iron Fist.

	Power-Man's partner. He had a pretty good series in the 70's, too.

The Watcher.

	The nosy guy with the big squash. Remember when he had a normal head and a plump body?

Ice Man.

	He was an X-Man, disguised as Rampage, a member of the Spider-Friends and had a solo limited series.

Wonder Man.

	Any relation to Barry Williams? He does resemble Johnny Bravo, especially with those 'shades'. I wonder if he fits the suit?

Quicksilver.

	The brother of the Scarlet Witch. How could he let his sister marry an android?

Black Panther.

	He first appeared in Fantastic Four 52.
